resources.string: This app allows you to conveniently measure your blood glucose level from an image of your Regulators colorimetric test strip. Line up the blue splotch with the on-screen markers and tap the Analyze button. If the estimate seems reasonable, tap Save.

For optimal results, perform scan in a well-lit area, without shadows. A white, evenly colored sheet of paper should be used as the test strip, and the region behind the test strip should also be uniformly white.

This app was created by The Regulators, a group of Cooper Union students, for the engineering design class. More information can be found about this product at our website: https://theregulators.github.io.
